resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>85dcf32e-a48d-4a76-a907-944374430f0e#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Falusi búcsú cigányzenészekkel</string>
            <string language="en">village parting wiht gypsy musicians</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dorf Trennwiht Zigeunermusiker</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musiciens médians de bohémien de wiht de 
village</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">músicos divisores do cigano do wiht da vila</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musicisti di separazione del gypsy del wiht del 
villaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσικοί τσιγγάνων του χωριού χωρισμού wiht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">músicos de despedida del gitano del wiht de la 
aldea</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Falusi búcsú cigányzenészekkel 1840 körül</string>
            <string language="en">village parting wiht gypsy musicians around 1840</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Falusi búcsú cigányzenészek műdal nóta,  </string>
            <string language="en">village kermis, gypsy musicians song in folk style</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dorf Trennwiht Zigeunermusiker um 1840</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musiciens gitans de wiht médian de village autour
de 1840</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">músicos aciganados do wiht divisor da vila em 
torno de 1840</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musicisti zingareschi del wiht di separazione del
villaggio verso 1840</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσικοί τσιγγάνων του χωριού χωρισμού wiht 
περίπου 1840</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">músicos gitanos del wiht de despedida de la 
aldea alrededor de 1840</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dorf kermis, Zigeunermusikerlied in der Volksart</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">kermis de village, chanson gitane de musiciens dans le 
modèle folklorique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">kermis da vila, canção aciganada dos músicos no 
estilo popular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">kermis del villaggio, canzone zingaresca dei musicisti 
nello stile piega</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">του χωριού kermis, τραγούδι μουσικών τσιγγάνων στο 
λαϊκό ύφος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">kermis de la aldea, canción gitana de los músicos en 
estilo popular</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
